title: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query includes a tree control that lists the tables and columns in the data source. Currently, the tree is loaded immediately upon opening the page.
OB: Currently, when opening the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query, the tables and columns in the data source tree control are loaded automatically.
EB: The loading of tables and columns in the data source tree control should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter. This will improve performance and allow for a smoother user experience.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query. 
2. Observe that the tables and columns in the data source tree control are loaded automatically. 
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter. 
4. Observe that the tables and columns are loaded on demand as the user interacts with the tree.
